content:
I think I came across a web hit, that indicated you could generate a schema with : org.hl7.fhir.definitions.generators.specification.json.SchemaGenerator

Is there a tool that can take the son schema (such as Coding.schema.json) and generate a SQL table from that definition ?
We generated tables from StructureDefinitions as the first iteration of fhirbase - you will get more than 1000 tables as result :(

We generated tables from StructureDefinitions as the first iteration of fhirbase - you will get more than 1000 tables as result :(

Yep ... need to only select the resources you need.
